column4: Hi, I am using dual boot (Vista/Ubuntu 7.10) and I want that if I'll start my computer then hilighted choice will be ista, atm it is Ubuntu, how I can change it?
Hi, I am using dual boot (Vista/Ubuntu 7.10) and I want that if I'll start my computer then hilighted choice will be ista, atm it is Ubuntu, how I can change it?
How I can change GRUB settings?
try qgrubeditor. works well for a gui to grub. search it
